Author: nodamncatnodamncradl
Text: You've been working hard to foster new coping mechanisms/use a healthier routine lately so it makes sense that a big event is triggering thoughts that make you feel out of control but honestly look at all the changes you've made recently (your second sentence).  You've done a lot and already looked into how to possibly manage the thoughts/behaviours that are coming up because of the party.   I know you were just venting but yeah from where I'm sitting it sounds like you are committed to treating yourself better, IMO "recovery" doesn't require perfection, just effort.
